reviews.review: horror, palpitaciones, miedo, adrenalina, me gusta.

Arkadaşlarla girerseniz güzel, zevkli bir oyun fakat oyunda her tür insanla karşılaşabildiğiniz için sabırlarınızı fazla zorlayan bir oyun hele de siz katilseniz ve karşı taraf takımsa. Dikkat: Sabrınız varsa bu oyunu oynamanızı tavsiye ederim aksi halde sinir krizi geçirebilirsiniz.

Faydalı tarafları:
 -Reflekslerinizi geliştirir
 -Güzel oynuyorsanız fazlasıyla eğlendirir
 -Arkadaşlarınız ile girerek katil delirterek eğlenebilirsiniz
 -Toxic bir katil olarak oyun zevkinizi artırabilirsiniz(Toxic olunca maç sonunda küfür yemek garanti)
 -Toxic bir kurban olarak oyun zevkinizi artırabilirsiniz(Katilin morali fena halde bozulur)

 Zararlı tarafları:
 -Katilken Toxic bir takıma denk gelirseniz psikolojinizi etkileyebilir
 -Kurbanken Toxic bir katile denk gelirseniz ani sinir krizi geçirebilirsiniz
 -Kötü oynuyorsanız oyunlardan soğuyabilirsiniz
 -Sinir krizi geçirirken etrafa zarar verebilirsiniz


Ryzen 7 4800h 
Gtx 1650 ti
16gb ddr4 dual 3200 mhz ram
1080p Ultra test yaptım.

It's a fun game. A lot of salt, but at least it's not as cancer as playing Rust.
got facecamped by ms piggy after leading her around for 5 gens. 10/10

สนุกดี แต่บัคบ่อย

This game has the worst multiplayer design I have ever seen. 

Reason: The host of the game is the killer

Problems:
1. They put you on a hook and while your struggling just turn on their lag switch to auto kill you which is pretty much the equivalent to cheating without any possible punishment.
2. There are characters with speed boosts so if they have bad ping they can slowly move to you and when you see them they use their dash on their end and it looks like a teleport kill on your end.
3.Ranged characters get to have a different timing to throw items when lagging so if you hear ms axe lady rearing up to throw an axe just know that she already hit you.

noice

even tho there are pepole playing who just want to make you suffer
Cross play made this game go from good to shit. Still love playing with friends tho. Love seeing them rage at the game.
Ich würde es jedem empfehlen der auf Spannung, Horro und Spaß steht. 4 gegen 1 Killer. Das klappt auch sehr gut. Grafik update soll kommen evtl. Aufheden Fall 5 Sterne.
games fun. BBQ and Chili perk for killer is to overpowered
after about 6 hours you're like, this gets kinda boring, and then you realize that either sneaking around and not getting seen by the killer for the whole game, or messing with the killer is a blast.

Fun, IF you have 4 (Minimum) to 5 friends and don't care about winning most games. 
There are some broken killer combinations, some that ruin all counterplay so you're just rolling dice that you dont get found  and there are some crappy ones that you can make work if you use your consumable items and lose some more games in order to get consumables again. 
The devs seem to have tried really hard to balance it but it won't ever get there seeing as they've been trying for 4 years.
这破游戏bug是真的多玩几局枯萎者好家伙直接疯狂闪现走的每一步全都是卡着走的还动不动回到一开始的地方想走都走不了这次改动更是离谱这两天打了无数个吃板刀都不算那血彪的半屏都是结果不算

Heart-racing, nerve-racking fun. Great music/sound while playing. Same objective but difficulty varies every match. Great selection on characters, and love that they keep adding classic and well-known terrifying killers/monsters! 10 out of 10. (some occasional minor bugs but nothing too serious to bother gameplay, and they'll probably have it patched pretty quickly)
Muy buen juego y adictivo, si lo juegas con amigos es mas divertido y aparte no es muy necesario que pagues por los killer o survivors los puedes ir comprando mientras juegas.
Excelente juego, siempre material nuevo. Siempre en crecimiento. Felicitaciones al equipo desarrollador
I LIKED WHEN KILLR HITS ME HARD AND I CRIE ERRYTIME
Play with headphones. In the dark. With friends. Great game.
10 из 10 только не хватает голосового чата
It's a pretty terrible game with a toxic community but it has its moments
The best game ever!!! highly recommended for people who likes being chased and chasing people :)

I love this game. Don't expect to win every game in the beginning, just have fun with it. When you stop being jump scared is when you really start to pick up skills. High levels I've heard can be toxic, but being crappy around rank 15 out of 20 is filled with nice people for me.

Un juego sencillo en cuestión del que hacer, muy buena la dificultad. Increible
This is the first asymmetrical game I've played, and I'm totally hooked! There's lots of challenge and variety.
总体还是非对称游戏中比较优秀的，虽然有着几天换一次的bug和始终无法平衡的机制，人类不得不速修，杀手不得不针对，但是也能玩。。。趁4周年捞一波道具再说^_^

gets a little dizzy for the weak

I recommend this because it's a fun game to play if you enjoy survival horror + playing with strangers or friends. I think its worth it but for its price it's better if you wait for a sale. I bought the Silent Hill DLC but I was extremely disappointed that I have to pay (again) if I want extra skins for Heather... Seriously?

Game used to be good, now they couldnt balance anything, the devs care more about sales and flashy cosmetics than fun, there was an issue with privacy and people getting doxxed and swatted for being connected to their servers (which they refused to ever comment on), and they havent created a fun killer or survivor for years. Havent opened the game in ages, dont plan to. Hopefully they turn things around, but its been on a downhill climb for ages. Dont even bother.
I scream all the time and probably drive my neighbors crazy but this game really gets my heart pumping! An absolute must for horror fans!
Scary and a tun of fun!
Хорошая игра, разве что когда в жизни шаги слышу, начинаю в страхе прятаться под стол. Рекомендую :).
